answers.answer: One of my friends ate before the one hour test with her DD and failed the test.  Then she decided not to listen the second time around, and didn't eat when she was preggo with her DS.  She passed!  I personally failed the 1 hour test and passed the 3 hour.  Next time around, I might do the same thing and try not to eat.

I don't think it makes much difference but I would just say try not to eat anything with a high sugar content before. That could seriously throw it out of whack. Try to have your meal and then the blood test about an hour later that way you give your body come time to digest it. Good Luck

question: they say this test doesnt require fasting, but has anyone had more luck (ie, passed) it if they fasted ahead of time? or will it really not make a difference? thanks in advance-
title: eating before the 1-hour gestational diabetes test
